headline: General Mills: Better Days Ahead (Upgrade)
summary: General Mills' fundamentals remain shaky but the slowing of margin contraction and decent FY2026 guidance shows better days are ahead.

headline: Will Blue Buffalo's Love Made Fresh Launch Change General Mills' (GIS) Investment Narrative?
summary: General Mills, through its Blue Buffalo brand, recently announced the nationwide launch of Love Made Fresh, a premium fresh pet food line now available in major retailers across the US. This expansion allows General Mills to tap into the quickly growing fresh pet food market by leveraging Blue Buffalo’s brand recognition and broad retail presence. We'll explore how entering the premium fresh pet food segment could shape General Mills' future growth prospects and overall investment...
